q: In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' chief executive Steve Ballmer wrote in an email to company employees that Microsoft published. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. One of the feathers in Satya Nadella 's cap includes leading the technical efforts on the launch of Microsoft's Bing search engine, new releases of MSN, and the integration of Yahoo! across Bing and adCenter.

country's historical sites.`` Egyptian cultural heritage, both its monuments and its artefacts, are part of the ancestral heritage of humanity, handed down to us through the ages,'' she said. The value of the 120,000 pieces in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo is inestimable, not only in scientific or financial terms, but because they represent the Egyptian people's cultural identity. Playing down the damage But the country's newly appointed minister of antiquities, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against`` rumours.''

In his Feb. 3 posting, Zahi Hawass sought to dispel rumors that the Egyptian Museum had caught fire and to reassure people that the nation's treasures are safe. I am the only source of continuing truth concerning antiquities, and these rumors are aimed at making the Egyptian people look bad, Zahi Hawass wrote.`` If anything happens to the museum, I would bravely tell everyone all over the world because I am a man of honor, and I would never hide anything from you. To me, it's a disaster, said New York-based labor activist Jonathan Tasini .`` When the question on the table should be creating jobs, you have Joe Biden picking someone whose main role has been to put out this awful report on deficit cutting.''
